Review Text: After finally taking advantage of my Amazon Prime membership's video feature the first show I began watching was "Justified' after hearing people (most notable Robin Quivers) say how good it is.  I have to agree- it's well acted, written and directed.  My favorite actor on the show after Timothy Olyphant is Erica Tazel.
Review Title: Enjoying discovering 'Justified'!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Takers [Blu-ray]
Paul Walker  (Actor),     Hayden Christensen  (Actor)    Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
['This high-stakes action thriller stars Matt Dillon, Paul Walker, Idris Elba, Jay Hernandez, Michael Ealy and Tip “T.I.” Harris. After pulling off a spectacular series of brilliantly planned bank robberies, a notorious team of professional criminals attempts one last heist, a once-in-a-lifetime job with a $25 million payoff. And all that stands in their way is a cop hell-bent on doing whatever it takes to solve the case and bring the', 'Takers', 'down. Chris Brown and Hayden Christensen costar in an adrenaline-rushed thrill ride packed with twists and turns.']
{'Genre': 'Action, Drama', 'Format': 'AC-3, Blu-ray, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Paul Walker, Hayden Christensen', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 47 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '15423113', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Blu-ray, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 47 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 18, 2011', 'Actors': 'Paul Walker, Hayden Christensen', 'Dubbed': 'Portuguese, French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French, English, Portuguese', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
The only true robbery is by anyone buying this movie.  It had been a long time since I've seen an action movie with such a combination of bad acting, horrible directing, a snoozer for a script and a cast that couldn't deliver their lines with any sort of skills.  Rappers, C-list movie stars and singers make up this woeful cast of 'professional' bank robbers who only 'take' the big ones... the major chase scenes are so ridiculous you will roll your eyes and shake your head as you watch them.... there was a host of reasons a sequel wasn't made.
Ugh....
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Adam Arkin', 'Jon Avnet', 'Peter Werner', 'Michael Dinner', 'John Dahl', 'Bill Johnson', 'Michael W. Watkins', 'Gwyneth Horder-Payton', 'Don Kurt', 'Dean Parisot'], 'Producers': ['Sarah Timberman', 'Carl Beverly', 'Michael Dinner', 'Graham Yost', 'Elmore Leonard'], 'Studio': ['FX Cable Channel']}
After finally taking advantage of my Amazon Prime membership's video feature the first show I began watching was "Justified' after hearing people (most notable Robin Quivers) say how good it is.  I have to agree- it's well acted, written and directed.  My favorite actor on the show after Timothy Olyphant is Erica Tazel.
Enjoying discovering 'Justified'!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preferences:** User continues to favor action and drama genres, demonstrated by their enjoyment of a critically acclaimed series characterized by strong narratives and character development.
- **Entertainment Quality:** The user places a high value on production quality, including acting, writing, and directing, which aligns with their previous criticism of films that lack these qualities. Their recent rating of 5.0 suggests a positive experience with well-executed content.
- **Rating Standards:** While typically critical with an average rating reflecting high expectations, the user's recent rating demonstrates openness to engaging content that meets or exceeds their standards, indicating selective appreciation for quality entertainment.
- **Engagement Style:** The user maintains a straightforward and honest approach in reviews, favoring direct acknowledgment of strengths and weaknesses. They highlight particular actors and their performances, showcasing a blend of personal preference and objective assessment.
- **Interest in Star Power:** The user shows a continued interest in performances by well-known actors, reinforcing the idea that star power can enhance enjoyment as long as the execution is strong and authentic.

Overall, the user values high-quality storytelling and performances, displaying a discerning taste that appreciates exceptional production while remaining critical of anything perceived as subpar. Their recent positive interaction suggests a willingness to embrace compelling content when it aligns with their standards.
